member.name: T:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainContext
member.summary: Represents the minimal context required for a specific brain task. This is the ONLY object that should be passed to LLM execution layers. Contains no file paths, no raw brain folders, only required data.

member.name: P:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainContext.Task
member.summary: The task this context was created for.

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainContext.GetArtifact``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a typed artifact from the context.
member.typeparam: The type of artifact to retrieve
member.returns: The artifact if present, null otherwise

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainContext.GetAllArtifacts
member.summary: Gets all artifacts in the context.
member.returns: Dictionary of all artifacts keyed by name

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainContext.ToJson(System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions)
member.summary: Serializes the context to JSON for LLM consumption.
member.returns: JSON string representation of the context

member.name: P:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainContext.Metadata
member.summary: Gets metadata about the context (files loaded, token estimate, etc.).

member.name: T:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.BrainContextMetadata
member.summary: Metadata about a brain context.

member.name: P:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.BrainContextMetadata.Version
member.summary: Contract version for C# ↔ Node.js communication.

member.name: P:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.BrainContextMetadata.FilesLoaded
member.summary: Files that were loaded to create this context.

member.name: P:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.BrainContextMetadata.EstimatedTokens
member.summary: Estimated token count for this context.

member.name: P:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.BrainContextMetadata.CreatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the context was created.

member.name: P:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.BrainContextMetadata.CacheHit
member.summary: Whether any files were loaded from cache.

member.name: T:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainLoader
member.summary: Loads AI Brain artifacts from disk. Responsible for file I/O and deserialization only - no business logic.

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainLoader.LoadJsonAsync``1(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Loads and deserializes a JSON file from the AI Brain directory.
member.param: Path relative to the brain root directory
member.returns: Deserialized object
member.exception: If the file does not exist

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainLoader.LoadMarkdownAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Loads a markdown file from the AI Brain directory.
member.param: Path relative to the brain root directory
member.returns: File content as string
member.exception: If the file does not exist

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainLoader.FileExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a file exists in the AI Brain directory.
member.param: Path relative to the brain root directory
member.returns: True if file exists, false otherwise

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainLoader.GetAbsolutePath(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to a brain artifact.
member.param: Path relative to the brain root directory
member.returns: Absolute file path

member.name: T:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainRouter
member.summary: Routes brain tasks to the minimal required context. Enforces the principle: "AI Brain is indexed, not injected."

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainRouter.RouteAsync(AppWeaver.AIBrain.Models.BrainTask,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Routes a brain task to its required artifacts and produces a minimal context.
member.param: The type of brain task to execute
Optional task-specific parameters (e.g., capability ID, schema name)
member.returns: A minimal brain context containing only what is required for this task
member.exception: If required artifacts cannot be loaded

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainRouter.GetRequiredFiles(AppWeaver.AIBrain.Models.BrainTask,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Gets the list of files that will be loaded for a given task. Useful for logging, debugging, and token budget calculation.
member.returns: List of relative file paths that will be loaded

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Abstractions.IBrainRouter.EstimateTokenCountAsync(AppWeaver.AIBrain.Models.BrainTask,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Estimates the token count for a given task's context. Used for budget enforcement before LLM calls.
member.returns: Estimated token count

member.summary: Contract version constants for C# ↔ Node.js communication. CRITICAL: Increment version when breaking changes are made to contracts.

member.summary: Current contract version. Format: MAJOR.MINOR - MAJOR: Breaking changes (incompatible) - MINOR: Backward-compatible additions

member.summary: Minimum supported contract version. Node.js must send a version >= this value.

member.summary: Validates that a contract version is supported.
member.returns: True if supported, false otherwise

member.summary: Validates component specifications against capability bounds and rules.

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Validation.CapabilityValidator.ValidateAgainstCapability(AppWeaver.AIBrain.Models.Specs.ComponentSpec,AppWeaver.AIBrain.Models.Capabilities.ComponentCapability)
member.summary: Validates that a ComponentSpec adheres to its capability's bounds and forbidden behaviors.

member.name: T:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Validation.RuleValidator
member.summary: Validates component specifications against PCF rules. Implements the 34 validation rules from the validation-safety spec.

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Validation.RuleValidator.PascalCaseRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[A-Z][A-Za-z0-9]*$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [A-Z].
○ Match a character in the set [0-9A-Za-z] atomically any number of times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Validation.RuleValidator.CamelCaseRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$
Explanation:
○ Match if at the beginning of the string.
○ Match a character in the set [a-z].
○ Match a character in the set [0-9A-Za-z] atomically any number of times.
○ Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.name: M:AppWeaver.AIBrain.Validation.RuleValidator.ValidateRules(AppWeaver.AIBrain.Models.Specs.ComponentSpec)
member.summary: Validates a ComponentSpec against all PCF rules.
